summary: Charlie and Cliff decide they want to go to the Full Moon party in Thailand. Along the way they travel around the world sprinkling the ashes of their dead friend Paul. As they go from ... See full summary »
cast: Neil Mandt|Marc Carter|Gregory Poppen|Eric Wing|Heather Petrone|Ron Carlson|Peter Abbay|Daithi O'Caoimh|Gavin Cooney|Pong|Bert Hickson|Neil Hogan|Donahue Jarrett
title: Last Stop for Paul
